abstract: The study of Zytiga from Johnson & Johnson also showed that it could pose a competitive threat to a rival drug, Provenge from Dendreon.
snippet: The study of Zytiga from Johnson & Johnson also showed that it could pose a competitive threat to a rival drug, Provenge from Dendreon.
lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson said Thursday that its new drug for prostate cancer was effective when used earlier during treatment than it is now, potentially broadening its use and also posing a competitive threat to a rival drug, Dendreon’s Provenge.

headline.main: Trial Shows Benefit in Using Prostate Cancer Drug Early
headline.print_headline: Trial Shows Benefit in Using Prostate Cancer Drug Early
